T02D2572:32a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sam g'i ti bi dhi s'u tra pi tri tra /
T02D2572:32a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i cho ga mdo dang bsres pa /
T02D2572:32a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2572:32a-5: ye shes lus can gtsug gi nor bus mtshan //
T02D2572:32a-6: dus gsum sangs rgyas gzugs gnas kun la khyab //
T02D2572:32a-7: lam mchog dam pa ston pa sman pa'i mchog / sdug bsngal bdud 'dul 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2572:32a-8: mtshan brjod bdud rtsi gsang spyod rtogs dka' ba //
T02D2572:32a-9: bdag blo mun pas dgrol bar mi nus kyang //
T02D2572:32a-10: dad pas phyogs bzung thigs par nor bu cig / lung dang man ngag dag la brten nas bshad //
T02D2572:32a-11: theg mchog rnams kyi gzhir gyur pa //
T02D2572:32a-12: dus gsum rnams kyi lam mchog 'di //
T02D2572:32a-13: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul dang ni //
T02D2572:32a-14: slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa yis //
T02D2572:32a-15: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul gyis //
T02D2572:32a-16: dpag bsam shing chen phyogs 'di brtsam //
T02D2572:32a-17: ye shes lus can 'jam dpal gcig pu sgrub //
T02D2572:32a-18: mdo dang bsres pa'i cho ga'i rim pa ste /
T02D2572:32a-19: de la dang po sgrub pa po rigs dang mthun pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir yon tan las /
T02D2572:32a-20: gzhan yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin zhes pas mtshan nyid dang dbang thob pa ston to //
T02D2572:32a-22: gsang sngags rig sngags 'chang ba'i rigs //
T02D2572:32a-24: bden par smra zhing tshig ma 'gyur //
T02D2572:32a-25: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
T02D2572:32a-26: ces pas sgrub pa po snod du rung bar ston to //
T02D2572:32a-27: yon tan las ri dang klung nags tshal tshang tshing
T02D2572:32b-0: nang na 'dug @32b kyang rung zhes pas gnas rigs
T02D2572:32b-1: dang mthun pa 'am yid dga' pa ston to //
T02D2572:32b-2: bzang ngan shes shing dus shes pa //
T02D2572:32b-4: gza' dang rgyu skar dang nyi ma shis pa la bya ba'i rim pa ston to //
T02D2572:32b-5: dpal ldan 'byor ba kun byed pa //
T02D2572:32b-6: zhes pa sgrub pa po'i rdzas don rab tu gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2572:32b-8: me tog dang dri dang byug pa dang /
T02D2572:32b-9: mchod pa'i khyad par mang po dang /
T02D2572:32b-11: yo byad kyi tshogs bya ba'i rim pa ston to //
T02D2572:32b-12: yon tan las ma rungs pa 'dul ba'i rgyal po zhes pa dang /
T02D2572:32b-13: gshin rje gshed po bgegs kyi rgyal //
T02D2572:32b-14: zhes pas mtshams kyi rim pa h'um gis mtshan pa
T02D2572:32b-15: las khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed mdog nag
T02D2572:32b-16: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa dbyug to dang sdigs
T02D2572:32b-17: mdzub byed pa / sprul dang thod pas brgyan pa bskyed la /
T02D2572:32b-19: ces pas mig tu ma dang ta bkod de /
T02D2572:32b-20: 'od zer gyis rdo rje'i rab dang dra ba bya bar bstan to //
T02D2572:32b-21: snying rje chen po blo yi mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2572:32b-22: phan 'dogs sems can mnyes gshin pa //
T02D2572:32b-23: zhes pas sems can gyi don du bdag gis 'jam
T02D2572:32b-24: dpal thob par bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa bstan to
T02D2572:32b-25: // gnyis med gnyis su med par ston //
T02D2572:32b-27: aa ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog /
T02D2572:32b-28: ces pas thogs pa med pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D2572:32b-29: thabs dang shes rab kyi brdar gyur pa'am snying gar
T02D2572:32b-30: ye shes sems dpa' bsam par bya ba bstan to
T02D2572:32b-31: // bla ma gsang sngags che ba'i mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2572:32b-33: rtag tu ri mor bya ba'i 'os //
T02D2572:32b-34: bkur 'os rjed par bya ba'i mchog / phyag byar 'os pa bla ma'i rab //
T02D2572:32b-36: bdag gi snying gar aa 'am h'um bsams te /
T02D2572:32b-37: de las 'od 'phros pas bla ma dang dkon mchog gsum dang /
T02D2572:32b-38: rje btsun 'jam dpal dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas bdag gis bltas te /
T02D2572:32b-39: lus kyi bkod pas lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyag byas la bstod do //
T02D2572:32b-40: bum pa bzang po che ba'i mchog / ces pa dang /
T02D2572:32b-41: dpag bsam shing chen rgyas pa ste //
T02D2572:32b-42: zhes pas mchod pa'i khyad par nam mkha' dang mnyam
T02D2572:32b-43: par bsgrubs la snying ga'i lha mos dbul lo zhes
T02D2572:33a-0: ston to // sbyin bdag chen po gtso @33a * //
T02D2572:33a-2: tshul khrims chen po 'chang ba'i mchog / bzod chen 'chang ba brtan pa po //
T02D2572:33a-3: brtson 'grus chen po brtul ba yin //
T02D2572:33a-5: sngas dang phyag rgya dang ldan pas bdag gi snying
T02D2572:33a-6: ga nas lha mo bzhi spros te gnas rnams su
T02D2572:33a-7: mchod par bya'o // de bas na /
T02D2572:33a-8: dbugs 'byin chen po dga' ston che //
T02D2572:33a-9: dga' chen rol mo chen po ste //
T02D2572:33a-10: bkur sti rim gro phun sum tshogs //
T02D2572:33a-12: bsam gtan chen po ting 'dzin gnas //
T02D2572:33a-14: smon lam ye shes rgya mtsho ste //
T02D2572:33a-16: byang chub yan lag me tog spos /
T02D2572:33a-17: zhes bya bas phyi'i lha mo bzhi dang /
T02D2572:33a-18: snying gnas gong gi tshul du spags dang /
T02D2572:33a-19: phyag rgya dang bcas pas gnas su dbul lo //
T02D2572:33a-20: mchod pa chen po 'dod chags che //
T02D2572:33a-22: dga' ba chen po mgu ba che //
T02D2572:33a-23: zhes pa'i bar gyis gsang ba'i lha mo bzhis mchod par bstan to //
T02D2572:33a-24: aom rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus pa na //
T02D2572:33a-25: rdo rje rin chen bla na med //
T02D2572:33a-26: rdo rje chos kyi glu blangs pa //
T02D2572:33a-27: rdo rje las kun byed par shog / ces bya
T02D2572:33a-28: ba 'di rkang pa dang gsang ba'i mchod pa byed
T02D2572:33a-29: pa'i dus su sgeg mo la sogs pa dang rim
T02D2572:33a-30: pa ji lta ba bzhin du rkang pa bzhi glur
T02D2572:33a-31: blang bar bya'o // gzhan yang mchog tu gsang ba'i mchod pa dang /
T02D2572:33a-32: chags pa la sogs pas dbul te rgyas par ma phye'o zhes bstan to //
T02D2572:33a-33: de nas 'dud nyi shus bstod de /
T02D2572:33a-34: yang na ni thams cad kyis bstod par shes par bya'o //
T02D2572:33a-35: de nas sngom pa bzung ba'i bar de nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
T02D2572:33a-36: byams pa dang snying rje ni shin tu gsal bar ston par tshad med pa bzhi bsgom zhes so //
T02D2572:33a-37: rnam par mi rtog dbyings mi zad //
T02D2572:33a-38: chos dbyings dam pa zad mi shes //
T02D2572:33a-39: yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //
T02D2572:33a-40: yang dag mtha' ste yi ge med //
T02D2572:33a-41: ces pa'i don bsgom pa ni rang bzhin dag pa'i sngags brjod de /
T02D2572:33a-42: phyi dang nang gi dngos po stong par bsgom zhes bstan to //
T02D2572:33a-43: stong pa nyid dga' 'dod chags blo //
T02D2572:33a-44: srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa ste //
T02D2572:33a-45: zhes pas padma'i steng na chos kyi 'byung gnas /
T02D2572:33a-46: de'i mtha' 'od zer lngas bskor ba'i nang du padma
T02D2572:33a-47: dang zla ba'i steng du mum dmar skya'i de bzhin
T02D2572:33a-48: gshegs pa'i phreng ba de gyur pa las /
T02D2572:33b-0: @33b sprin dkar dag pa bzhin du dkar //
T02D2572:33b-2: nyi ma 'char ka'i dkyil ltar mdzes //
T02D2572:33b-3: sen mo'i 'od ni shas cher dmar //
T02D2572:33b-4: cod pan bzang po mthon ka'i rtse //
T02D2572:33b-5: skra mchog mthon ka chen po pa //
T02D2572:33b-6: nor bu chen po 'od chags dpal //
T02D2572:33b-7: sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyan dang ldan //
T02D2572:33b-8: zur phud lnga ba me tog thod //
T02D2572:33b-9: sdug gu 'jig rten gsum na mdzes //
T02D2572:33b-10: shes rab ral gri mda' gzhu thogs //
T02D2572:33b-11: rdo rje skyil krung rdzogs sangs rgyas //
T02D2572:33b-12: dpal ldan blo dang sgeg par ldan //
T02D2572:33b-13: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba //
T02D2572:33b-14: nyon mongs g-yul du gcig dpa' ba //
T02D2572:33b-15: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis rje btsun gyi
T02D2572:33b-16: sku sprul pa'i cha lugs su bstan pa yin no
T02D2572:33b-17: // phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //
T02D2572:33b-18: zhes pas yum bzhi'i phyag rgya 'phro 'du dang bcas pa'i byin brlabs bstan pa yin no //
T02D2572:33b-19: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed //
T02D2572:33b-20: ces pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang
T02D2572:33b-21: kho bo dang khro mo dang lha mo rnams thugs
T02D2572:33b-23: de nas mdun du padma dang zla ba la ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te /
T02D2572:33b-24: dbang bskur ba dang mchod pa dang /
T02D2572:33b-25: bstod pa gong bzhin byas te ye shes sems dpa' de la bltas la /
T02D2572:33b-26: dgug cing rang lus la gnyis su med par bsgom zhes pas gnyis su med par byas te /
T02D2572:33b-27: rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur dpal //
T02D2572:33b-28: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag cod pan can //
T02D2572:33b-29: zhes pas snying ga'i 'od kyis bskul te /
T02D2572:33b-30: bum pa'i chus dbang bskur bas rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dang ldan pa zhes bstan to //
T02D2572:33b-32: zhes pas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bcas la
T02D2572:33b-33: sngags dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du sangs
T02D2572:33b-34: rgyas thams cad sprul lo zhes bstan to //
T02D2572:33b-36: bdag rig gzhan rig thams cad pa //
T02D2572:33b-37: shes dang shes bya'i bdag po mchog / ces pas thams cad sems kyi sprul par shes par bya'o //
T02D2572:33b-38: de ltar rdzogs pa dang mtshan sngags bzlas shing mtshan bklag par bya'o //
T02D2572:33b-39: de lta bu yon tan las kyang rigs kyi bu'am
T02D2572:33b-40: rigs kyi bu mo gang la gsang sngags kyi spyad
T02D2572:33b-41: pa spyod pa gang la la //
T02D2572:34a-0: bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs @34a * //
T02D2572:34a-1: pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2572:34a-2: don dam pa'i ming gi gtsug gi nor bu 'di
T02D2572:34a-3: thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang mnyams shing lhag
T02D2572:34a-4: chad med par tshigs su bcad pa'i tshig dang /
T02D2572:34a-5: yi ge 'bru 'di dag nyid kyis nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du 'chang ba dang /
T02D2572:34a-6: kun chub par byed pa dang /
T02D2572:34a-7: gzhan dag la yang dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2572:34a-8: du ston pa dang ming gi don gang yang rung
T02D2572:34a-9: ba re re nas kyang 'jam dpal ye shes sems
T02D2572:34a-10: dpa'i sku la dmigs te zhes bya ba dang /
T02D2572:34a-11: rtse gcig tu bsgom pa de la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /
T02D2572:34a-13: nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du mnyam par yi dam du lan gsum du 'don tam /
T02D2572:34a-14: glegs bam du byas pa la kha ton du klog
T02D2572:34a-15: cing brjod pas bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i
T02D2572:34a-17: gzugs dang gnyis su mthun par bsam gtan du byed
T02D2572:34a-18: pa ni 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir ring por mi
T02D2572:34a-19: thogs pas de nyid du sprul pa'i gzugs kyi lus
T02D2572:34a-20: mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don 'di yin
T02D2572:34a-21: te / mtshan nyid kyi cho ga rdzogs shing dmigs
T02D2572:34a-22: pa la yun ring du gnas pa des rdo rje
T02D2572:34a-24: manydzu shr'i dh'i: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02D2572:34a-26: zhes pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rnam par sprul la /
T02D2572:34a-27: phyag sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa la sogs pas
T02D2572:34a-28: bdag cag gi lus de dang mnyam par sprul te
T02D2572:34a-29: / mtshan gyi don re re nas bstod la yon
T02D2572:34a-30: tan rnam pa 'di ltar smos pas bdag dang gzhan
T02D2572:34a-31: la dpag tu med par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2572:34a-32: mdor na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ring po
T02D2572:34a-33: mi thogs par dam pas bsngags pa thob par 'gyur
T02D2572:34a-34: ro // yang na gsang sngags kyi rim pha thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2572:34a-35: dam pa brgyud pa'i bla ma'i bdud rtsi 'thungs //
T02D2572:34a-36: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir gyur la //
T02D2572:34a-37: dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstod tshig 'di //
T02D2572:34a-38: sman pa'i rgyal po bzhin du bdag gis bshad //
T02D2572:34a-39: 'phrod pa'i sman bzhin kun la phan gyur nas //
T02D2572:34a-40: mi rtog ye shes 'chi med thob par shog //
T02D2572:34a-41: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod
T02D2572:34a-42: pa'i mdo don mdor bsdus pa'i cho ga sgyu 'phrul
T02D2572:34b-0: dra ba'i @34b rgyud le 'u khri drug stong pa
T02D2572:34b-1: las rdo rje glur blangs pa'i le'u'i sgrub thabs mdo
T02D2572:34b-2: dang bsres pa / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2572:34b-4: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
